LanguageData.GR_AgePills.label: age pills
LanguageData.GR_AgePills.description:
These capsules are filled with a mixture of chemicals and nanomachines, able to modify an organism's age by carefully manipulating its DNA. Every pill taken increases age by 1 year. Useful for animals to make them mature quickly.

Once consumed, the animal will be extremely dizzy for at least a day, and additional pills administered during that period won't be effective.

Oh, your colonists can also consume them...
LanguageData.GR_ElectroEgg.label: mechanoid egg
LanguageData.GR_ElectroEgg.description: This diminutive egg seems to be metallic in nature at first, yet it is soft enough to crush it between two fingers. Once thus crushed it can be swallowed normally, and the active mechanites inside have a reinvigorating effect on the consumer. This effect can be slightly addictive, though.
LanguageData.GR_FeatherdustJoint.label: featherdust joint
LanguageData.GR_FeatherdustJoint.description: Bearchicken feathers can be gathered and processed into a fine powder, which produces a mild euphoric sensation when burned and inhaled. Featherdust use can produce a dependency.
LanguageData.GR_PoisonAmpoule.label: poison ampoule
LanguageData.GR_PoisonAmpoule.description: This tiny vial is filled with a concentrated solution of Muffalokomodo saliva, which acts as a powerful neuromuscular-blocking drug. This effectively paralyses anyone foolish enough to drink it, though it is not lethal. Useful for prisoner control.
LanguageData.GR_RoyalJelly.label: royal jelly
LanguageData.GR_RoyalJelly.description: This pungent, viscuous liquid is produced by some types of insects, and produces a soft chemical high. It can cause addiction if abused.
LanguageData.GR_VirulentPoison.label: virulent poison
LanguageData.GR_VirulentPoison.description: This tiny vial is filled with a small amount of Thrumbolizard venom. When ingested, the whole system of the victim shuts down, akin to an anaphylactic reaction. There is no antidote, and no way to survive the poison.
LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub.label: animal control hub
LanguageData.GR_AnimalControlHub.description: Once the animal control hub is active in your map, you can access new abilities in your hybrids, allowing you to control them directly. Note that the hub has a very limited range, and will only work in your main base.
LanguageData.GR_ArchotechPlatform.label: archotech construction platform
LanguageData.GR_ArchotechPlatform.description: This construction platform houses the technology necessary to assemble an Archotech Centipede, a bio-mechanical creature powered by an Archotech AI under the control of your colonists.\n\nWhoever controls an Archotech Centipede controls the planet. Bear in mind however that activation of this project will attract A LOT of unwanted attention.
LanguageData.GR_SpentArchotechPlatform.label: archotech construction platform
LanguageData.GR_SpentArchotechPlatform.description: This construction platform has already been used.
LanguageData.GR_RefrigeratedCoils.label: refrigerated coils
LanguageData.GR_RefrigeratedCoils.description: Structural cryofuel coils to connect all the parts of the Archotech Project. At least one needs to be built to keep the sensitive components properly refrigerated.
LanguageData.GR_TurboChargedCryostabilizedEngine.desc: This engine supplies the archotech platform with stabilized cryofuel to power the whole project.\n\nCryofuel is produced by Boomalope / Muffalo hybrids.
LanguageData.GR_ArchotechDatabase.label: master archotech database
LanguageData.GR_ArchotechDatabase.description: This database stabilizes and subjugates the archotech AI, keeping it under control of the colonists. This technology is very advanced and has inherent risks, such as the archotech AI going rogue, killing everyone in the planet, and using their corpses as batteries to power a martial arts simulation. Or sending robots to the past.\n\nMechanoid interface chips, can be obtained from crashed mechanoid ships (both psychic and poison) or very expensively built in a Fabrication Table if you research Advanced Fabrication.
LanguageData.GR_GeneticRepository.label: centralized genetic repository
LanguageData.GR_GeneticRepository.description: The centralized genetic repository stores large amounts of genetic material from different species. The archotect construction platform will use these materials to re-sample the DNA and turn it into a custom tailored genetic structure to fill the organic parts of the archotech centipede.\n\nNote: this building will need 1 of each genetic material obtainable, and the project needs 5 repositories in total. Use the Recombinator extensively if, for example, muffalos do not appear in your map.
LanguageData.GR_MechanoidTinkeringTable.label: mechanoid tinkering table
LanguageData.GR_MechanoidTinkeringTable.description: A workbench equipped with advanced tools to dissasemble mechanoids and use the acquired knowledge to create the Archotech Centipede.\n\nNote: bear in mind that this building is not a real workbench!
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearRug.label: huge bear rug
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearRug.description: A bear pelt rug. Taxidermy seems to be in vogue on the Rim!
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearCatRug.label: huge bearcat rug
LanguageData.GR_HugeBearCatRug.description: A bearcat pelt rug. This thing seems to be quite more exotic than other pelt rugs!
LanguageData.GR_WolfRug.label: wolf rug
LanguageData.GR_WolfRug.description: A wolf pelt rug. Taxidermy seems to be in vogue on the Rim!
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloRug.label: muffalo pelt rug
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloRug.description: A muffalo pelt rug. Taxidermy seems to be in vogue on the Rim!
LanguageData.GR_BoarTuskStatuette.label: small boar tusk statuette
LanguageData.GR_BoarTuskStatuette.description: A boar tusk carved into an artistic form.
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf.label: lab shelf
LanguageData.GR_LabShelf.description: A shelf for storing miscellaneous laboratory items. Items stored in this will not deteriorate, even if outside.
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat.label: nutrient vat
LanguageData.GR_NutrientVat.description: A slurry of liquefied organic pulp fills this reinforced glass vat. This solution is used by genetic experiments, and increases work speed when placed near a Genetic Rim machine. One workbench can use to up to two nutrient vats.
LanguageData.GR_CryostabilizedEngine.label: cryo-stabilized generator
LanguageData.GR_CryostabilizedEngine.description: The cryo-stabilized generator is a chemfuel generator that has been modified to accept cryogenically refrigerated fuel. Produces power by consuming cryofuel and must be fueled by hand.
LanguageData.GR_GeneticExtractionTable.label: genetic extraction table
LanguageData.GR_GenePod.label: genepod
LanguageData.GR_GenePod.description: Genetic material samples are combined and grown in this laboratory.
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod.label: advanced genepod
LanguageData.GR_AdvancedGenePod.description: Genetic material samples are combined and grown in this laboratory. The vats of growth compound accelerate some of the most difficult experiments.
LanguageData.GR_Pulper.label: pulper
LanguageData.GR_Pulper.description: Turns wood into a pulp, useful as a base organic compound.
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler.label: recycler
LanguageData.GR_PulpRecycler.description: Turns corpses, produce and unwanted incubators into a pulp, useful as a base organic compound.
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator.label: gene recombinator
LanguageData.GR_GeneRecombinator.description: Mixes genes from different species, and produces genes from other species at random. Or not. Also, be careful, you don't want to mix frogs with other things. Life finds a way.
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat.label: tissue growing vat
LanguageData.GR_TissueGrowingVat.description: Accelerates growth of organic structures, allowing accelerated development of genetically manipulated hybrid implants. This building is used for both hybrid animal implants and humanoid implants.
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator.label: gene duplicator
LanguageData.GR_GeneDuplicator.description: This advanced machine can be used to grow and duplicate almost any kind of genetic material. It consumes a large amount of organic pulp and most of it is wasted on the process. Also, tt won't work on Thrumbo and Mechanoid genes.
LanguageData.GR_AlphaSerumExtractionTable.label: paragon serum extraction table
LanguageData.GR_AlphaSerumExtractionTable.description: This worktable allows you to refine animal genes and extract a concentrated essence called paragon serum, which can be used to raise more evolved versions of your animals in the animal enrichment center.
LanguageData.GR_AnimalEnrichmentCenter.label: animal enrichment center
LanguageData.GR_AnimalEnrichmentCenter.description: This machine can fill an incubator with specific paragon serum and an organic base compound to create advanced versions of your base creatures.
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench.label: genetrainer bench
LanguageData.GR_GenetrainerBench.description: The Genetrainer bench allows jury rigging of mech serum neurotrainers, healers and resurrectors to craft genetrainers, single use artifacts that inject animal genetic material in a human being, acting as a powerful implant that doesn't take the place of any organ in the body.
LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap.label: IED nitromilk trap
LanguageData.GR_NitroMilkTrap.description: A bucket of Muffalope milk connected to a homemade battery and electrodes. When the trigger is disturbed, an electrical current excites the unstable milk, and the device explodes. The improvised trigger has a random delay that might allow a nimble enemy to escape.
LanguageData.GR_BearLeg.label: animal Implant: bear leg (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BearLeg.description: A prosthetic animal leg strengthened with bear muscles, and ending in a powerful bear claw that adds a powerful melee attack.
LanguageData.GR_LizardLeg.label: animal Implant: lizard leg (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_LizardLeg.description: A bionic animal leg reinforced with tough lizard skin.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboLeg.label: animal Implant: thrumbo leg (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboLeg.description: A bionic animal leg reinforced with muscle tissue from a powerful thrumbo.
LanguageData.GR_ScytherTail.label: animal Implant: scyther tail (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_ScytherTail.description: A scyther tail created by attaching a scyther blade to an animal's tail. Note that only creatures with a natural tail can use this.
LanguageData.GR_MechaTail.label: animal Implant: mechanoid tail (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaTail.description: An advanced mechanoid tail, even more powerful than the old scyther tail. Note that only creatures with a natural tail can use this.
LanguageData.GR_CanidEye.label: animal Implant: canid eye (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_CanidEye.description: An eye implant that uses genetic splicing with canid genes to give an old (or damaged) eye decent vision. This implant is not meant to replace healthy eyes.
LanguageData.GR_InsectileEye.label: animal Implant: insectile eye (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_InsectileEye.description: A bionic implant which gives the creature compound insectile eyes. Compared with simple eyes, compound eyes possess a very large view angle, and can detect fast movement.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboEye.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo eye (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboEye.description: A bionic eye reinforced with specialized photoreceptors from a powerful thrumbo.
LanguageData.GR_RodentEar.label: animal Implant: rodent ear (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_RodentEar.description: An ear implant that uses genetic splicing with rodent genes to give an old (or damaged) ear decent hearing. This implant is not meant to replace healthy ears.
LanguageData.GR_MothTympanalOrgan.label: animal Implant: moth tympanal organ (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_MothTympanalOrgan.description: A bionic implant adding a moth tympanal organ to the creature's ear. Moths can hear sounds of a higher frequency than any bat can produce.
LanguageData.GR_MechaReceptors.label: animal Implant: mechanoid auditory receptors (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaReceptors.description: These mechanoid auditory receptors can scan a really wide band of frequencies.
LanguageData.GR_RodentNose.label: animal Implant: rodent nose (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_RodentNose.description: An implant that uses genetic splicing with rodent genes to give an old (or damaged) nose decent smelling. This implant is not meant to replace healthy noses. Can't be installed on birds and insects.
LanguageData.GR_InsectoidPheromones.label: animal Implant: pheromone receivers (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_InsectoidPheromones.description: An implant that uses genetic splicing with alien insectoid genes to give the ability to detect pheromones, thus improving the olfactory system. Can't be installed on birds and (ironically) insects.
LanguageData.GR_MiniatureThrumboHorn.label: animal Implant: miniature thrumbo horn (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MiniatureThrumboHorn.description: A bionic implant adding a small thrumbo horn where the creature's nose used to be. This implant acts as a nose, allowing the creature to breathe and smell, and can be used by the creature in melee. Birds, insects, and creatures that already have a thrumbo horn don't have enough space on their skull to install this implant.
LanguageData.GR_WolfJaws.label: animal Implant: wolf jaws (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_WolfJaws.description: An implant that uses genetic splicing with wolf genes to give an old (or damaged) jaw decent functioning. This implant is not meant to replace healthy jaws.
LanguageData.GR_InsectMandibles.label: animal Implant: insect mandibles (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_InsectMandibles.description: A bionic implant adding insect mandibles to the creature's face. Insect mandibles improve manipulation and eating, while also working as an offesive weapon
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboJaws.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo jaws (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboJaws.description: A bionic implant adding thrumbo jaws to the creature's mouth. These creatures devour trees, so you can imagine their jaws are up to the task.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloSpine.label: animal Implant: muffalo spine (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloSpine.description: A spine implant that uses genetic splicing with muffalo genes to give an old (or damaged) spine decent functioning. This implant is not meant to replace healthy spines.
LanguageData.GR_CrocodileSpine.label: animal Implant: crocodile spine (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_CrocodileSpine.description: A bionic implant adding a sturdy crocodile spine to the creature's skeletal system.
LanguageData.GR_MechaSpine.label: animal Implant: mechanoid spine (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaSpine.description: A bionic implant adding a plasteel structure with active mechanites to the creature's skeletal system.
LanguageData.GR_ChickenBrains.label: animal Implant: chicken brains (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_ChickenBrains.description: An implant that uses chicken brain tissue to patch damaged neurological pathways. This implant is intended for brain-dead creatures.
LanguageData.GR_MonitorLizardBrain.label: animal Implant: monitor lizard brain (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_MonitorLizardBrain.description: A bionic implant using monitor lizard brain tissue. This highly intelligent reptile has very quick reflexes.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboBrain.label: animal Implant: bionic thrumbo brain (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboBrain.description: A bionic brain implant using thrumbo neural tissue. Superb intelligence and reflexes.
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeHeart.label: animal Implant: boomalope heart (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeHeart.description: An implant that uses chemfuel to pump blood through the animal's body. This implant is intended for creatures whose heart is failing catastrophically, since it is less efficient than a natural heart.
LanguageData.GR_ChitinousHeart.label: animal Implant: chitinous heart (tier 2)
LanguageData.GR_ChitinousHeart.description: A bionic heart implant using a reinforced shell of insectoid chitin for protection. This is a heart designed to take a beating. Pun intended, but it's the last one, I promise .
LanguageData.GR_MechaHeart.label: animal Implant: mechanoid heart (tier 3)
LanguageData.GR_MechaHeart.description: A bionic heart strengthened by the action of active mechanites.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloLung.label: animal Implant: muffalo lung (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloLung.description: An implant that uses muffalo genes to increase breathing capacity.
LanguageData.GR_BearLiver.label: animal Implant: bear liver (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BearLiver.description: An implant that uses bear genes to improve function of the liver. Specially useful for those alcoholic chickens.
LanguageData.GR_ChickenKidney.label: animal Implant: chicken kidney (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_ChickenKidney.description: An implant that uses chicken genes to improve function of the kidney. Birds have large kidneys. Yep, you learned that today.
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeStomach.label: animal Implant: boomalope stomach (tier 1)
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeStomach.description: An implant that uses boomalope genes to improve function of the stomach.
LanguageData.GR_BearClaws.label: human Implant: bear claws
LanguageData.GR_BearClaws.description: An improvement over the bionic Power Claw, these claws have been vat-grown with a mixture of human and bear DNA, and replace the subject's hand with versatile, non-retractable claws.
LanguageData.GR_DiggingBearClaws.label: human Implant: digging bear claws
LanguageData.GR_DiggingBearClaws.description: Grotesque but powerful hand blades that have been modified to be used in mining operations, increasing both speed and yield.
LanguageData.GR_BearMuscleTissue.label: human Implant: bear muscle tissue
LanguageData.GR_BearMuscleTissue.description: Grafts of bear muscle tissue on the subject's torso increase overall strength and stamina. These grafts however tend to stimulate the production of an abundance of body hair.
LanguageData.GR_HibernationModule.label: human Implant: hibernation module
LanguageData.GR_HibernationModule.description: A biochip that modifies the brain to reduce the need for sleep.
LanguageData.GR_Ovipositor.label: human Implant: ovipositor
LanguageData.GR_Ovipositor.description: You know you have gone too far in your scientific experiments when you are implanting a human being with an ovipositor. This will enable the colonist to lay chicken eggs twice a day. It hurts as hell, though. Also, yuck.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloMuscles.label: human Implant: muffalo strengthened muscles
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloMuscles.description: By weaving muffalo muscle strands with the subjects muscular system, strength, resilience and carrying capacity are greatly increased.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloMammaries.label: human Implant: muffalo mammaries
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloMammaries.description: By implanting muffalo mammaries into a colonist... Wait, what??? Who came up with this idea????? Anyway... this implant allows your colonist to be milked... Ugh, I give up.
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloSkin.label: human Implant: muffalo skin
LanguageData.GR_MuffaloSkin.description: A synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to low temperatures.
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeNodules.label: human Implant: boomalope nodules
LanguageData.GR_BoomalopeNodules.description: These skin nodules can be integrated in a human's torso, causing a huge explosion if the subjects dies violently.
LanguageData.GR_ChemfuelStomach.label: human Implant: chemfuel stomach
LanguageData.GR_ChemfuelStomach.description: A reinforced bionic stomach that uses a combination of gastric acid and chemfuel to efficiently digest food.
LanguageData.GR_ChemfuelHeart.label: human Implant: chemfuel heart
LanguageData.GR_ChemfuelHeart.description: A reinforced bionic heart that acts like a miniature 4-stroke internal combustion engine powered by chemfuel to pump blood through the body.
LanguageData.GR_WolfMuscularFibers.label: human Implant: wolf muscular fibers
LanguageData.GR_WolfMuscularFibers.description: The subjects legs can be modified by weaving hybrid human/wolf muscle fibers within the base tissue, giving her a significant strength and speed boost.
LanguageData.GR_DevouringJaws.label: human Implant: devouring jaws
LanguageData.GR_DevouringJaws.description: A set of improved teeth designed to rapidly chew and ingest any kind of food. Leaves kind of a mess, though...
LanguageData.GR_NeuronReinforcement.label: human Implant: neuron reinforcement
LanguageData.GR_NeuronReinforcement.description: A biochip using animal stem cells to reinforce the natural abilities of human neurons, increasing learning and research speed.
LanguageData.GR_MousePheromones.label: human Implant: mouse pheromones
LanguageData.GR_MousePheromones.description: A bionic vomeronasal organ that allows the subject pheromonal communication with other animals, increasing the chance of taming and training them successfully.
LanguageData.GR_MoleratNerveDampener.label: human Implant: mole-rat nerve dampener
LanguageData.GR_MoleratNerveDampener.description: A biochip that reduces pain sensitivity, allowing the subject to survive pain shock.
LanguageData.GR_BunnyEars.label: human Implant: bunny ear
LanguageData.GR_BunnyEars.description: This huge leporid ear gives amazing enhanced hearing. Also, super kawaii!
LanguageData.GR_InsectoidAntennae.label: human Implant: insectoid antennae
LanguageData.GR_InsectoidAntennae.description: These hybrid humanoid / insectoid feeling appendages can be implanted in a subject's head, completely modifying the way the subject "sees" and feels the surrounding world. The experience may be slightly overwhelming due to sensorial overload.
LanguageData.GR_CompoundEye.label: human Implant: compund eye
LanguageData.GR_CompoundEye.description: This hybrid humanoid / insectoid eye provides improved vision in a wide range of different wavelengths, including those usually outside the human range, completely modifying the way the subject perceives his surroundings.
LanguageData.GR_PsychicDampeners.label: human Implant: psychic dampeners
LanguageData.GR_PsychicDampeners.description: Artificial hearing aids that block psychic emanations, providing considerable resistance to mechanoids' psychic attacks.
LanguageData.GR_KidneyToxicFilters.label: human Implant: kidney toxic filters
LanguageData.GR_KidneyToxicFilters.description: This is a bioelectronic kidney prosthesis that greatly improves the efficiency of the subject's kidney by using insectoid tissue, providing resistence to toxic substances.
LanguageData.GR_HumanThrumboHorn.label: human Implant: thrumbo horn
LanguageData.GR_HumanThrumboHorn.description: A genetically modified thrumbo horn that can be implanted in a subject's forehead. Nasty.
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboSkin.label: human Implant: thrumbo skin
LanguageData.GR_ThrumboSkin.description: A synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a lot of defense and makes the subject more resistant to extremes of temperature.
LanguageData.GR_VenomousFangs.label: human Implant: venomous fangs
LanguageData.GR_VenomousFangs.description: This hybrid implant substitutes the subject's jaw with a set of venomous fangs. Useful in combat, but not very comfortable.
LanguageData.GR_IguanaScales.label: human Implant: iguana scales
LanguageData.GR_IguanaScales.description: A synthetic skin substitute that is much thicker and a much better insulator than human skin. This provides a measure of defense but, more importantly, makes the subject more resistant to high temperatures.
LanguageData.GR_MechanoidInterfaceChip.label: mechanoid interface chip
LanguageData.GR_MechanoidInterfaceChip.description: This stellated octahedron-shaped chip is a marvel of advanced technology. Used by mechanoids to interface technology with organics for unknown purposes, it could probably be repurposed for bioengineering. (This chip is used to create mechanoid hybrids in Genetic Rim, if you have the appropiate research)
LanguageData.GR_HybridBearGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid bear genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridBearGenesGenetrainer.descriptio: Injects hybrid bear genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives a series of abilities related to bear resilience.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridBoomalopeGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid boomalope genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridBoomalopeGenesGenetrainer.descr: Injects hybrid boomalope genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the ability to produce chemfuel like a boomalope.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridCatGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid cat genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridCatGenesGenetrainer.description: Injects hybrid cat genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the keen sight ability, increasing shooting accuracy.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridChickenGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid chicken genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridChickenGenesGenetrainer.descrip: Injects hybrid chicken genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the birdlike curiosity ability, increasing global learning speed.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridMuffaloGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid muffalo genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridMuffaloGenesGenetrainer.descrip: Injects hybrid muffalo genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the wild attunement ability, increasing plant work speed, carrying capacity, foraging and... leather amount.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridRodentGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid rodent genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridRodentGenesGenetrainer.descript: Injects hybrid rodent genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the gregarious ability, increasing all social abilities.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridWolfGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid wolf genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridWolfGenesGenetrainer.descriptio: Injects hybrid wolf genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the wolf speed ability, increasing movement speed, eating speed and immunity gain speed.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridReptileGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid reptile genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridReptileGenesGenetrainer.descrip: Injects hybrid reptile genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the cold blood ability, making the subject more stealthy and resistant to high temperatures.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridInsectoidGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid insectoid genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridInsectoidGenesGenetrainer.descr: Injects hybrid insectoid genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the eusocial mind ability, making the subject specialized in construction and repair at the expense of plant and animal skills.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridThrumboGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid thrumbo genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridThrumboGenesGenetrainer.descrip: Injects hybrid thrumbo genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the animal empathy ability, making the subject much more efficient when dealing with animals.\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.
LanguageData.GR_HybridMechanoidGenesGenetrainer.label: hybrid mechanoid genes genetrainer
LanguageData.GR_HybridMechanoidGenesGenetrainer.descr: Injects hybrid mechanoid genes in an humanoid. This genetrainer gives the plasteel skin ability, making the subject immune to catching fire (bear in mind, fire explosions will still cause damage, but the subject will not catch fire).\n\nGenetrainers are implants that do not take the place of any given organ. Only one can be "installed" at a time. Using a second genetrainer will have no effect and the genetrainer will be wasted. Bear in mind that a genetrainer modifies the genes of the human subject, and only death will get rid of its effects.

LanguageData.GR_ChickenrabbitIncubator.label: chicken / leporid incubator
LanguageData.GR_ChickenrabbitIncubator.description: This incubator has to be kept at a temperature between 0 and 50 degrees Celsius until the genetically modified organism is ready to hatch. The embryo will develop into a Chicken / Leporid or Leporid / Chicken hybrid
